name: Splithem
description:
🎲🔫 Splithem is a frenetic FPS game where you will have to destroy all the dice, but be careful not to let them touch you.

🤪🦾Splithem challenges you to reach your limits in aiming skills escaping from the dice meanwhile.

You can try to win the game by score or by time, are you a speedrunner🏃‍♂️💨 or a high scorer🏆?

🧉This game was made by Lucas Bacelo (itchio), Guido Salcedo and Lucas Della Sala for the GMTK Game Jam 2022. It's our first game developed! 😲 Tell us if you enjoy it!

✨👏Thanks to these amazing people who helped us test it:
Keila Burzio | Canfor Alguinio | Lorenzo Chio | María Soledad Sánchez | lunaajulietaa | Rodrigo Testa | axelsagaart | juli.240 | Santi Nader | Mati Cobe
